label: Cash
comment: Coins, banknotes paid by the recipient of goods or services to the provider.

objectProperties.comment: The indication of whether or not this cash used for payment. is applicable.
The code specifying a currency of this cash used for payment.
A textual description of cash used for this payment.
The code specifying the type of cash used for payment.

referencedBy.comment: A cash payment identified for this trade settlement payment means.
